title: Late Night Sighting by Motorist near I-10
observed: my mom and i where driving home from a friends house and we noticed a very large man crouched on the side of the road so we turned the car around to see if he needed help by the time we had returned he was gone so we continued on are way and about a quarter of a mile down the road we saw a very large thing cross the road in two steps it walked upright had very dark brown red shaggy fur and it had to have been 7.5-8 foot in hight after we witnesses this we where pretty spoked so we didn't stick around
